# DeepLine Operations

> Revenue recovery specialists for distributors. We help distributors find and reactivate dormant customers using data analytics.

## About
DeepLine Operations helps distributors ($5M-$100M revenue) recover revenue lost to silent customer churn. Founded by Mo Roowala, M.S. Robotics from NYU Tandon, with 6+ years in data systems engineering.

## Services
- Customer Data Diagnostic: 48-hour QuickBooks export analysis identifying dormant accounts and revenue at risk
- Recovery Plan: Prioritized reactivation list with messaging recommendations
- Automated Outreach: Set-and-forget email campaigns to bring dormant customers back

## Key Facts
- Distributors lose 15-25% of customers annually to silent churn
- Customer reactivation costs $312 vs $1,847 for new acquisition (6x cheaper)
- 92% of distributors have no churn early warning system
- Average recovery: $180K per quarter for mid-size distributors
- 20-30% dormant customer reactivation rate
